Find your home at Chelsea Court.

Ideally situated in the heart of Clarkston, Georgia, Chelsea Court offers spacious one-bedroom apartment homes with all-electric kitchen appliances, washer and dryer connections, and ample closet space.
Chelsea Court’s teams are dedicated to providing great service to all residents.
Our apartments are minutes away from Stone Mountains State Park and I-285.
This community enables you to enjoy a private and peaceful atmosphere while being conveniently located near local shopping, dining and banking.
We also offer 24-hour emergency maintenance, a functional front gate, online resident rental payments and Marta at your doorstep.
Visit us at <URL>/

Application fee $50.00 with a $200.00 reservation fee

Qualifications:
• Income 3x the rent or more.
• No Evictions, Collections, Felonies, or Bankruptcies on the background and credit check.
*We also verify rental and employment.
Our office is open Tuesdays and Thursdays of each week
